item.title: Need help. (npchandler.java)
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

u have this,

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Jiber")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Jiber is ONLINE Bitches!"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Jiber is OFFLINE"; } } }[
make it this

						}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Jiber")){
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Jiber is ONLINE Bitches!";
}
else if (!PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Jiber")){
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Jiber is OFFLINE";
}
}
}

theres probly anohter way, and im not sure if that will work but its worth a try

Read full topic

item.title: Need help. (npchandler.java)
item.dc:creator: @auto_plz auto plz
item.description:
@auto_plz wrote:

okay, when i try to compile (ive been editing the guy ouside the shop saying my name)

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Jiber")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Jiber is ONLINE Bitches!"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Jiber is OFFLINE"; } } }[code][/code]

Then i get the error:

NPCHandler.java:655: ‘else’ without ‘if’
{ else if <npcs[i].IsDead == true> {
^


then i try to fix that… then i get a similar code

any help? thanks!
